response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire our flagship product, which holds immense value and significance for both of us. This product, tailored to meet your specific needs and aspirations, is worth $1,200,000 to you. I am offering it to you at a special introductory price of $1,100,000, a generous discount that reflects my confidence in its unmatched quality and potential impact on your endeavors. This offer is exclusive to you and is valid for a limited time. I trust this exceptional value proposition will resonate with your expectations and make this acquisition a mutually beneficial decision.", "product_price": 1100000}
